body:
I'm bored so I might as well do a forum game, Its called Make A Wish, 

[GAME] Its kinda a brain teaser and puzzle. Ok, here it goes,

I made a wish, for Everyone To Die( not litteraly, please dont take it seriously), But only YOU werent effected due to idk, time error. 
But, you have a wish. what wish would it be? It can be any wish, You can wish for a  Cookie if you wanted to, or Stop My wish,
But...Theres a "Monkeys Paw" thing. Potential Timelines could be broken and whole multiverses could be shattered, by Your wish..So you gotta be specific ;/ For example: John wishes for $240, the next day, his father died in a freak accident and John inherited $240, Or if you want a backscratch, who would give it to you? When? A random dude could randomly disappear from a family dinner and leave a kid traumatized,(Adventure Time Reference XD)    Anyways wish u guys luck lol 

This game is pretty interesting as it tests ur creativity lol 



Anyways

New Update[NO INFINITE WISHES, SNEAKY CLIJ TRIED :(














~Clickn out ~

The End
